answers.answer: Wow thats so exciting! Im 39w4d and due on sunday. My baby boy has had some trouble engaging into my pelvis properly so the doc spoke of a possible induction if i havent gone into labour myself by a weeks time.  You'll have to write a post letting me know what its like!At least you have an exact date of when things will be getting started, so you can be ready!All the best and let us know how it goes.
Good luck!  Hope everything turns out to be ok.  Come back and let us know how you're doing :)

question: Ok, so I am 38 weeks today, after two mc and no children we are way excited, but very nervous.  I have gestational diabetes, and he doesn't want me to go to term because he thinks that little Hannah will be just to big for me to push out.  So I will be induced on Monday the 9th, unless i go into labor myself, but as of today i am only at a 1 and she is still floating around.  So it's going to be a long weekend getting everything ready for her arrival.  I just hope it goes fast.  Just wanted to update.
title: Induction scheduled
